website_summaries.verdict: A Pleatco replacement cartridge for the Hayward Star-Clear Plus C-900 cartridge filter.
pros: This replacement filter is manufactured using reemay, a spunbonded, polyester fabric chosen for its added strength
The cartridge measures 17 3/8 inches tall with an outer diameter of 8 15/16 inches and an inner hole diameter of 4 inches and is comparable to the Sta-Rite PXC-95
cons: If you are diligent with regular cleaning, this unit will serve you well

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling my pool for almost a year trying to get the chemicals right and trying to get the pool crystal clear and not cloudy. I knew my filter needed to be replaced but, I didn’t know it was the reason my pool was cloudy and full of debris. I was hesitant to buy a new filter because they are very expensive at the pool store and this one is less than half of what they wanted to charge me. Upon installation in one week my pool was crystal clear and has been now for weeks. Will be continuing to by this as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bad first: filter and package where delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bad first: filter and package where delivered damaged. Box was crushed and the bottom of the filter was cracked. Just disappointing but it does not seem effect the performance. When I put the new filter in I immediately got much high water flow pressure from my pump so I gave it 5 stars. Second time I bought this filter and it's a very good product. This is the 3rd season with the old filter so it lasts a while. Got a new one so I could clean one and run the other.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: How did this get high reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this filter cartridge has gotten such rave reviews, we have not had one last more than 2 months, and the last one we bought is practically falling apart already. For the amount put in to trying to save some Money buying this cartridge I could have just bought a name brand that would last significantly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: It's worth doing your research on line.
customer_reviews.text: This cartridge was a replacement that we had originally bought as a new home owner for our pool from a name brand pool supply house. We paid close to $100.00 for this same cartridge, and would have paid close to $70.00 at a major home improvement store. After researching online I came across this replacement which was actually better quality but with a significant price reduction again. We are very pleased with our product and it is doing a great job at keeping our pool crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Best of the after-market filters
customer_reviews.text: This is every bit as good as the original Hayward filter. I have tried several after market filters and Pleatco is the best I've found. I do have another Pleatco that I alternate with that is about 2 years old and still works like new after it is cleaned. Normally, my Pleatco filters go 3-4 weeks before they need to be cleaned. The other aftermarket filters I have used need cleaning in 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: H S.

customer_reviews.title: Arby’s of Pool Filters! Meats Not for Sandwiches!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say that I have owned many of these. Reason is I don’t have to replace it often. I last bought this filter for my Hayward Pool Filter in 12/2017. I honestly had no idea it had been that long. My former pool guy used to charge me every 6 months. Might not be a bad idea but I clean my filter weekly and it functioned great until I finally replaced in 04/2020! Great filter and great price! My 8=====D is Nice!! F China!!! Hey yo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eaton Twats

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: I saved 50% on buying this on Amazon vs the local over priced pool store. It works just as good as the original did if not better. If your are looking for a good replacement pool filter than keep this in mind, I will be buying this again when i need it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: decent product until it broke
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this product before and it lasted more than 2 years before the quality started to degrade. The last one we bought lasted just one year until the plastic rings broke apart and separated from the paper filter. I'm not sure if we got lucky with the longevity on the first one of the last one was a dud. This product is easy to clean and kept the water clear while it was in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cole

customer_reviews.title: I can tell this one will hold up better. My old one didn't look so good when ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Solid cartridge. I replaced my cartridge last year with a cheaper model, and it did not hold up as well as I thought it should. I can tell this one will hold up better. My old one didn't look so good when I took it out of the package, but this one is firm, and held together much more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Tom n Debbie Young

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised, works great!
customer_reviews.text: It fit great in my Hayward filter! The first Pleatco filter lasted about 3 years before I noticed rinsing it clean, wasn’t getting it flowing like it used to. No damage, just getting pretty clogged up. I kept the old one as backup. I’ve had this new one in for 3 months now, haven’t even cleaned it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money compared to others
customer_reviews.text: We had used Porpoise filters in the past, and they are great filters, but when I compared the cost of the replacement filter at my local pool store at $70 with the $42 it cost me for this one, the decision was simple. I didn't get down and count every single pleat, but it looks like the Porpoise filter might have a few more pleats and be tighter, but it was not at all worth the $30 difference in price. I put this filter in and after a couple of days of standard use, my pool looks great again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rap

customer_reviews.title: best filter
customer_reviews.text: i recently swiched to a generic model and the thing crushed under the vacuum pressure it lasted two days. So i went back to the pleatco brand which i have ussed for the last 6 years . I can honestly say i will not switch again.
customer_reviews.author: Gld

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This filter cartridge lasted almost 2 months before the plastic/rubber cracked and collapsed. The cartridge looked like it had an elephant sit on it. I'll be going with another brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I replace my spa filter once a year and I keep buying this brand. Cleaning every 60 days with a garden hose is highly recommend to maximize its life. I have used TSP and muriatic acid with no damage to the filter. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stephen verville

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: The PA90 sits straight in the filter housing and the cap installs without binding. The Hayward C900 did not sit straight. That caused binding when installing the cap and premature o-ring failure.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: cleaned the pool water right away
customer_reviews.text: I was fighting with my pool tring to keep it clean till I installed this filter and an ozone generator now my pool in maintenance free
customer_reviews.author: Donald Rauch Jr

customer_reviews.title: Better than the OEM filter.
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly having to clean and flush the OEM filter and it was falling apart but not doing a very good job at cleaning the water. This one had the water looking crystal clear in about 24 hours and cleans up much more easily.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nickoloff

customer_reviews.title: Quality filters
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for years. They work fine and last a long time. I use an electric pressure washer to clean them, not too close.

customer_reviews.title: don't bother very poor customer service waste of your money

customer_reviews.title: Last longer than Hayward cartridges.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. These seem to last longer than the Hayward cartridges. I've used them for up to two years before replacing them. Even at that point, it still can be cleaned, but my pump pressure will go from 6 lbs when new, to 12 lbs when a few years old. To me that indicates time for replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Pleatco PA90 Cartridge
customer_reviews.text: I read a number of reviews for this product, some very good, a few not good. I have used this brand before and it was fine and lasted over 6 months. So is this. It's been installed now for over 6 weeks and is functioning perfectly, with no increase in water pressure showing on the filter gauge. As long as you keep you water in good condition and clean as required, I cannot see why anyone should have a problem with it. By far a lot cheaper than the main brand.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Service!👍

product_meta.title: Pleatco PA90 Replacement Cartridge for Hayward Star-Clear Plus Star-Clear Plus C-900, Sta-Rite PXC-95, 1 Cartridge
feature_bullets: Replacement filter for pool and spa cleaning systems
50% open ABS free flow cores maximize water flow through REEMAY filter media
Antimicrobial end caps resist chlorine degradation and provide support to filter material for a longer life span

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars815 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
